name: One Degree Connected
overview:
One Degree Connected is a new tool that helps leverage your business contacts. In your business, personal referrals can quickly grow your sales leads. But what’s the best way to translate on-line connections, into real-world referrals? Now, you can create real-life connections, by referral only, with One Degree Connected.

One Degree Connected is safe and permission-based. Members can search for people by name, company, title, and location. If a member is connected to the searched-for person, the searching member can request a connection (or personal referral) from the other member. And remember, the people in your contact database are never exposed.

I have found One Degree Connected’s tool to stand out in personal direct referrals. Rather than a just connected in other social networks, this requires a personal introduction and thought into how the referral will happen.
